changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}marketplace_space_app_rel` ( `id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `app_id` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '应用标识', `space_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '空间ID', `status` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '此空间站是否已开通(0:否,1:是)', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, KEY `k_app_id` (`app_id`) USING BTREE, KEY `k_space_id` (`space_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='应用市场-空间与应用开通记录表';
